Is this what you need notarized? 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jake,
I need page 16 - the I-9 Form, signed by a notary in section 2. I have attached an example of what a completed I-9 looks like.
Thanks! Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
